name: QuickEdit
body:
quickedit
=========

You can use QuickEdit to change the Quick-launch icons on the bottom when you swipe half the way up the screen from any app. Just start the app, click on the Quick-launch icon you want to change and then on the new app. That's all!
tagline: You can use QuickEdit to change the Quick-launch icons on the bottom when you swipe half the way up the screen from any app. Just start the app, click on the Quick-launch icon you want to change and then on the new app. That's all!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
